benchmark_info.name: Token Efficiency Benchmark
benchmark_info.methodology: Adversarial retrieval scenarios (queries designed to match wrong answer)

full_context.source: LOCOMO avg conversation length - entire history in context
full_context.note: Not directly comparable - measures total memory store size

mem0.source: Mem0 research (arxiv:2504.19413) - avg memory store size
mem0.note: Not directly comparable - measures total memory store size

mem0_graph.source: Mem0 with graph memory - nodes + relationships
mem0_graph.note: Not directly comparable - measures total memory store size

zep.source: Zep memory graph (disputed) - full KG serialization
zep.note: Not directly comparable - measures total memory store size
